content:
{
  "name": "config-profiler",
  "version": "2.0.3",
  "description": "Find configuration for the current file from provided path, workspace, package, settings, HOME directory or env variable",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "mrmlnc/config-profiler",
  "author": {
    "name": "Denis Malinochkin",
    "url": "canonium.com"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=4.0.0"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "config",
    "configuration",
    "profiler",
    "resolver",
    "finder",
    "resolve"
  ],
  "typings": "./out/config-profiler.d.ts",
  "files": [
    "index.js",
    "out"
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/debug": "0.0.30",
    "@types/extend": "^2.0.30",
    "@types/mocha": "^2.2.43",
    "@types/node": "^8.0.30",
    "@types/proxyquire": "^1.3.28",
    "mocha": "^3.5.3",
    "proxyquire": "^1.8.0",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.2",
    "tslint": "^5.7.0",
    "tslint-config-xo": "^1.3.0",
    "typescript": "^2.5.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "debug": "^3.0.1",
    "extend": "^3.0.1",
    "locate-path": "^2.0.0",
    "parse-json": "^3.0.0",
    "require-from-string": "^2.0.1",
    "tslib": "^1.7.1"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rimraf out",
    "lint": "tslint src/**/*.ts -p .",
    "compile": "tsc",
    "test": "mocha out/{,**/}*.spec.js -s 0",
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run compile && npm test",
    "watch": "npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run compile -- --sourceMap --watch"
  }
}
